publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3103 Dave Thompson: Keep Trade Local this Christmas—That the Parliament congratulates the Federation of Small Businesses in Scotland on its Keep Trade Local – Sustaining Scottish Communities campaign; recognises the contribution of small independent businesses not simply to the local economy but also to the wider community, and encourages MSPs to back their local traders in the current economic difficulties and source their Christmas dinners from small, independent businesses in their constituencies.
S3M-3103 Keep Trade Local this Christmas (lodged on 12 December 2008) Rob Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, John Park*, Bob Doris*, Mike Pringle*, John Lamont*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3103 Keep Trade Local this Christmas (lodged on 12 December 2008) Christina McKelvie*, Alex Neil*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3103 Keep Trade Local this Christmas (lodged on 12 December 2008) Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*, Roseanna Cunningham*

S3M-3103 Keep Trade Local this Christmas (lodged on 12 December 2008) Rob Gibson*, Nanette Milne*, John Park*, Bob Doris*, Mike Pringle*, John Lamont*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*, Alex Neil*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-3103 Keep Trade Local this Christmas (lodged on 12 December 2008) Angela Constance*
